titleStmt.title: The proceedings on the King's commissions at the assizes, held at Kingston upon Thames, for the county of Surrey; on Tuesday and Wednesday, the 13th. and 14th days of March, 1687/8. and in the fourth year of his Majesties reign. Giving an account of forty eight persons that was tryed. Viz. for coining, murther, felony, and burglary.
titleStmt.author: Great Britain. Assizes (Surrey, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Croom, at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle
